alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 4:44PM EST until January 02 at 5:15PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EST/415 PM CST/ FOR EASTERN JACKSON...DECATUR...EASTERN MILLER... DOUGHERTY...CENTRAL MITCHELL...BAKER AND CENTRAL SEMINOLE COUNTIES... At 444 PM EST/344 PM CST/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near East Albany to 8 miles west of West Bainbridge, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Newton, Bainbridge, Albany, Putney, Camilla, Baconton, West Bainbridge, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Brinson, Hanover, Ausmac, Babcock, Reynoldsville, Flint, Radium Springs, Lockett Crossing, South Albany and Southwest Ga Regional A/P. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST/800 PM CST/ for the Panhandle of Florida...and south central and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
